title: Number of denied response is high
description: HAProxy forwards the response generated by the backend server to the clients. This monitor tracks the number of denied responses to identify irregular increases, which could indicate security concerns within the HAProxy system.

definition.message:
The number of backend denied responses due to security restrictions for host: {{host.name}} is above normal.

A malicious attacker or misconfigured application could be to blame. More information on designing ACLs for HAProxy can be found in the [Introduction to HAProxy ACLs blog post](https://www.haproxy.com/blog/introduction-to-haproxy-acls/).
definition.name: [HAProxy] High number of backend denied responses for host: {{host.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:haproxy.backend.denied.resp_rate{*} by {host}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
